meanings.definition: Having a more pleasant or agreeable flavor.
meanings.sent1: The cake was tastier than the cookies.
meanings.sent2: I think homemade food is always tastier than fast food.
meanings.sent3: The tastier the food, the happier my taste buds!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a tastier melody than any song.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh bread baking was so tastier, it made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: More enjoyable or appealing to the sense of taste.
meanings.sent1: The ice cream was tastier with extra sprinkles on top.
meanings.sent2: I find fruits tastier when they are perfectly ripe.
meanings.sent3: The tastier the meal, the bigger the smile on my face!
meanings.sent4: His words were a tastier treat than any dessert.
meanings.sent5: The hot chocolate was so tastier, it warmed me up from the inside out.
